9809.quoteText: The service normally allows the user to increase the visibility of its profile in various way, but the organization reserves the right to disable the user's access to those features.
9809.title: Service can block or censor user communications

tosdr.case: User-generated content can be blocked or censored for any reason

9811.quoteText: The user can quit the service by closing their account.
9811.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

9812.quoteText:
The organization does not implicitly commit to
anything, in particular it does not guarantee that the service will be
operational at all times without interruptions
9812.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

9814.quoteText:
The user acknowledges that cookies are necessary for the service to function and
agrees to their use.
9814.title: This service requires first-party cookies

tosdr.case: First-party cookies are used

9815.quoteText:
The organization may modify this contract at any time.
It undertakes to inform
the user of any changes.
9815.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes

9816.quoteText: This contract is subject to French law. Any dispute shall be submitted to the competent French jurisdiction.
9816.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X

9817.quoteText: If a part of this contract is nullified, that judgment does not nullify the rest of the agreement.
9817.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

9818.quoteText:
The organization cannot be held responsible for the consequences of negligence
by the user, notably of failure by the user to secure their password.
9818.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

9819.quoteText:
The organization may close the user's account if it considers that they have
violated this contract, or a contract with a partner of the organization, or any
applicable law.
9819.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

tosdr.case: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

9820.quoteText: The user commits to use the service in good faith, in particular the user commits not to lie about their identity and not to fill their profile in a deceptive way for the purpose of attracting more donations.
9820.title: Users are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.

tosdr.case: You are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.

9821.quoteText:
The organization does not guarantee that the user will be able to withdraw the
money in its account without delay.
9821.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

9822.quoteText: In particular, the organization may impose a delay to deter and protect itself from fraud.
9822.title: This service throttles your use

tosdr.case: Your use is throttled

9823.quoteText: The organization guarantees that the funds the user has put in its custody will not be lost in case of bankruptcy of itself or of a third party to whom it has delegated the custody of the funds.
9823.title: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition

tosdr.case: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition

9824.quoteText:
Visitors of the liberapay.com website can also receive cookies sent by Cloudflare. Please read “Understanding the Cloudflare Cookies” if you want to learn more about them.

On some payment pages, extra cookies may be set by the payment processor. Please read these documents if you want more information: Stripe's cookie policy and PayPal's cookie policy.
9824.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information

tosdr.case: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

9825.quoteText: we do not attempt to track people who visit our website,
9825.title: This service does not track you

tosdr.case: You are not being tracked

9826.quoteText: we strive to collect only the personal information we actually need,
9826.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

9827.quoteText: we don't sell it to anyone.
9827.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: Your personal data is not sold
tosdr.tldr: full paragraph: "We do our best to protect everyone's privacy: we do not attempt to track people who visit our website, we strive to collect only the personal information we actually need, and we don't sell it to anyone." The last partial clause has been taken to support this point.

9831.quoteText:
All network connections are encrypted, except for some communications between machines located in the same datacenter.

As a precaution against identity theft in case of data leak, the identity information of Liberapay account owners is stored encrypted in our database.
9831.title: The user is informed about security practices

tosdr.case: Information is provided about security practices
